details.text: Team of 4, project submission for Geekfest Hackathon 2021 (1 day hackathon)
Project aims to gamify carbon footprint tracking to encourage users to make sustainable choices
Responsible for coordinating the team, teaching MVC design pattern and GitHub version control
Created JavaScript (jQuery) functions to create and control menu interface
Presented completed prototype through two rounds of judging

details.text: Individual submission for Google Developer Student Club's Demo Day Competition 2021
A quiz program for students to practice for tests and exams
Points are timer based, with players and scores tracked to show a leaderboard
Server hosted on MS Azure Virtual Machine, using a MySQL database
Supports multiple simultaneous client games

details.text: Single Page Application to highlight relevant projects
Utilizes JavaScript fetch method for dynamic loading of project data from Firebase realtime database
Supports dynamic dark/light theme on load, and dynamic resizing
Front-end created with only HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript ES6
Hosted on Google Cloud Platform

details.text: Term Project completed with a team of 4 students using Agile/Scrum methodology
A commercial application for a logistics company to take transport contracts, hire drivers, track deliveries, and invoice the customer
Responsible for implementing Buyer subsystem to obtain contracts, process invoices, Admin subsystem to change system settings, and logging functionality
Implemented automated unit test coverage for relevant code sections (blackbox and whitebox testing), as well as manual UI testing
System utilizes TCP/IP sockets to connect with external API as well as internal MySQL database
After a successful demo, our project received a grade of 95%

imageDescriptions.description: none
TMS Login Page
Buyer - generate invoices on completed orders
Admin - update carrier table in the database
Code snippet: create a new order from a contract
Code snippet: insert new order into the database
Code snippet: unit testing the Contract class methods
Unit Test Summary
Test plan for the project - all methods covered
Class diagram for Buyer subsystem
Azure DevOps utilized to manage Agile/Scrum sprints

details.text: A partner-based project that uses jQuery AJAX calls to simulate a 'Captain's Log' online text editor
Modeled on the Star Trek computer screens, this editor allows users to create, read, and update a log entry online
Logs are transferred in JSON format and parsed by the server, which creates, reads and writes to a local text file
Received a grade of 100%

The text editing area user interface

details.text: A console application that took in title, genre, and rating information and stored each movie in doubly-linked lists
Implemented linked lists, sort, and search algorithms from first principles (no libraries allowed)
Received a grade of 100%
